original_title: WWII in Europe: Voices from the Front
overview: May 8th, 2020 marks 75 years since Victory in Europe, when the Nazis surrendered to the Allies ending WWII in Europe. We relive that electrifying day, and many of the dramatic events leading up to it, through the words of the people who remember it.
title: WWII in Europe: Voices from the Front
